name: Marieta
description:
Marieta means "Ladybug" in catalan.

In this game you control a ladybug which want to collect as many flowers as possible while avoiding spikeballs and staying on-screen.

By collecting flowers, Marieta moves faster and staying on-screen will become a challenge.

I'll update the game on future updates to add more gamemodes and other changes to make this little arcade game bigger and bigger!
